des:
Ask for Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Facts skill provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Facts Skill" or "Alexa, open Facts Skill" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
